participant_1.background:
I like to sing in my room when no one is around.
I have fibromyalgia, so I need to stay warm this winter.
i m retired.
i have a crummy job at scrubway.

I have a hard time with my family, but I'm doing my best to work things out.
I try to wash my clothes at least once a week.
I play the guitar to express the thoughts that my weird mind can't.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
my favorite food is popcorn.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It's going okay. I'm just doing some laundry. How about you?
I'm great! Just got done singing in my room.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing all sorts of music, but my favorite is pop music.
Oh, me too! I love to sing Taylor Swift songs.
Me too! She's my favorite singer.
I'm glad we have something in common. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and go for walks.
I like to read and play video games too! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of games, but I'm really into role playing games right now.
Oh, I've never played a role playing game before. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! You get to create your own character and go on adventures.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation! I think I will.
